trans-unit.source: Best practices for Azure RemoteApp clients
trans-unit.target: Best practices for Azure RemoteApp clients

trans-unit.source: Learn about best practices for using the RemoteApp clients
trans-unit.target: Learn about best practices for using the RemoteApp clients

trans-unit.source: Best practices for Azure RemoteApp clients
trans-unit.target: Best practices for Azure RemoteApp clients

trans-unit.source: The following information can help you use Azure RemoteApp clients:
trans-unit.target: The following information can help you use Azure RemoteApp clients:

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the client version you are running has the latest bug fixes, improvements and features.
trans-unit.target: This ensures that the client version you are running has the latest bug fixes, improvements and features.

trans-unit.source: You might need to sign up to automatically receive updates for the client in the appropriate Store.
trans-unit.target: You might need to sign up to automatically receive updates for the client in the appropriate Store.

trans-unit.source: RemoteApp will automatically log you off if you are inactive for a certain period of time.
trans-unit.target: RemoteApp will automatically log you off if you are inactive for a certain period of time.

trans-unit.source: In order to prevent data loss, we recommend closing your applications when you finish using the service.
trans-unit.target: In order to prevent data loss, we recommend closing your applications when you finish using the service.
